short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that aggregates current operational statuses of some common Apps, web services and developer APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that aggregates current operational status and on-going incidents posted in the status pages of some common Apps, web services and APIs.
